long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
See photos and figures in a new way in MFC.

mfcviewer is an extension to explore MyFigureCollection with ease.

Enable and disable it by clicking on it or (Alt + q) to start it.

How does it work?

We capture the photos on the page you are viewing and show them all together so you can review them in the highest quality available.
You no longer need to open each photo to see them in full resolution, you can look at them all in one place. 

What do we do with your information?

Absolutely nothing, the extension requires the minimum permissions to work and is only limited to MFC, it only works on the page where it is activated and does not collect any information.

If you have any comments, we look forward to reading them.
